segments.text: I notice the water spilling over the sink, and it makes me so frustrated.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, doing nothing about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so reckless, climbing on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall, and then what?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how careless everyone is being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting ruined, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on that plate, and it’s infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to yell at them all to stop and clean up this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR
